drinks.name: Glenfiddich 15 Years
drinks.price: 750 ml @ Ksh 9,345 1 litre @ Ksh 10,400 750 ml @ Ksh 9,345 1 litre @ Ksh 10,400
drinks.description: Aroma: it has a tantalizing complex fragrance of Sweet vanilla fudge, rich dark fruit, and sweet honey.Taste: Smooth sherry oak, ginger, and cinnamon tantalize the taste buds. This combination gives the best sensory stimuli impression of a perfect drink to consume any day, any time.
